casebody.data:
L. Gessford HANDY and The Lionel Corporation, Appellees, v. AMERICAN FLYER MANUFACTURING COMPANY, Appellant. No. 315. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. April 6, 1931. Joel B. Liberman, of New York City (David P. Wolhaupter, of Washington, D. C., and Robert B. Killgore, of New York City, of counsel), for appellant. George F. Scull, Walton Harrison, and John M. Cole, all of New York City, for appellee.

Before L. HAND, SWAN, and AUGUSTUS N. HAND, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Decree [44F.(2d) 633] affirmed on opinion below.
